li.label: Giant paws
li.description: How am I supposed to do anything when I can't grab stuff?

li.label: Giant paws
li.description: Nice, I can claw people's eyes out!

li.label: Giant paws
li.description: These things are only good for hitting whoever did this to me.

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: It's not too different, I suppose I can get used to standing on it.

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: They're so soft, and I can run barefoot on gravel!

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: No no no, I want my regular, non-animal feet back!

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: They look just like an animal's feet, this is exactly what I want!

li.label: Bear face
li.description: I...want...fish...now!

li.label: Bear face
li.description: Nobody will mess with me now!

li.label: Bear face
li.description: I have the most horrible images of wanting to attack everything...

li.label: Chemfuel sac
li.description: What is...am I...LEAKING!?

li.label: Chemfuel sac
li.description: Okay, this is a bit too weird, even for me.

li.label: Chemfuel sac
li.description: This is...oh no, this is chemfuel...oh no no no...this can't be happening!

li.label: Chemfuel sac
li.description: I don't see the problem with this, especially if I'm going to be the full thing.

li.label: Reindeer face
li.description: Oh deer, this is going to be tough to get used to.

li.label: Reindeer face
li.description: Where's my red nose?

li.label: Reindeer face
li.description: STOP SINGING JINGLE BELLS TO ME!

li.label: Beak
li.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!

li.label: Beak
li.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.

li.label: Beak
li.description: My face! This is awf-scraw!

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: What the, where are my ears?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: ...does this make my butt look big?

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: I look like a damn bird, whyyyy?!

li.label: Cat face
li.description: My jaw doesn't feel right...

li.label: Cat face
li.description: I have whiskers now!? Nyan!

li.label: Cat face
li.description: Great, a face not even a mother could love.

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: These new ears look strange, but at least I can hear well enough.

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: I can hear everything, even the tiniest rodents!

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: I hear too much! Make the noise stop!

li.label: Cat tail
li.description: This tail keeps getting in the way, but it's good for balance.

li.label: Cat tail
li.description: Aww! It's so cute!

li.label: Cat tail
li.description: I keep tripping over this stupid tail!

li.label: Claws
li.description: Yowtch! Poked myself again.

li.label: Claws
li.description: Claws are so useful, I'll never need a knife again!

li.label: Claws
li.description: I keep poking holes in my clothes with these unruly claws!

li.label: Cat eyes
li.description: My eyes feel strange, but I can see better than I ever could before.

li.label: Cat eyes
li.description: I can see in the dark better than ever, and my eyes look so mysterious!

li.label: Cat eyes
li.description: These slit pupils make me look unnatural.

li.label: Beak
li.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!

li.label: Beak
li.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.

li.label: Beak
li.description: My face! This is awf-bawk!

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: ...does this make my butt look big?

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: I look like a damn chicken, whyyyy?!

li.label: Feathers
li.description: They're itchy as hell and get in the way of clothes...

li.label: Feathers
li.description: I could preen them all day.

li.label: Feathers
li.description: I keep pulling them out but they keep regrowing! They're so itchy, aaghhh!

li.label: Wings
li.description: How am I supposed to do anything with wings for arms?!

li.label: Wings
li.description: Wait, I can't fly with these, AND I lose my hands...? I'm starting to rethink this now...

li.label: Wings
li.description: Why, Randy, why?! I'm completely useless without my arms!

li.label: Talons
li.description: They're so...animal, and I leave scratches on wooden floors.

li.label: Talons
li.description: I can be really quick on these, and maybe do some damage!

li.label: Talons
li.description: No, not bird feet! Eugh!

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: How is this even possible? It feels so weird...

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: This is taking it too far. People weren't meant to lay eggs!

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: How!? Why!? What has become of me!?

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: I know I wanted this, but I'm not entirely sure now.

li.label: Tiny rodent face
li.description: It's hard to eat when my mouth is so small!

li.label: Tiny rodent face
li.description: My face is so tiny and cute!

li.label: Tiny rodent face
li.description: My face is so tiny!

li.label: Snake face
li.description: Thissss long tounge makesss it hard not to ssssssslur my Sssssss ssssounds...

li.label: Snake face
li.description: Sssssharp fangs to match a sssharp tounge.

li.label: Snake face
li.description: Sssssstupid tounge tassssting the sssstupid air... Now I have to tassste every rotten sssssmell too.

li.label: Snake hood
li.description: It'sss hard to fit a T-shirt over thissss hood now.

li.label: Snake hood
li.description: How exotic! I could ssscare away any jerks I don't like with thisss.

li.label: Snake hood
li.description: It's annoyingly big and ssscaly...agh!

li.label: Snake tail
li.description: Thissss will take ssssome getting ussssed to.

li.label: Snake tail
li.description: Sssslithering here, sssslithering there, sssslithering everywhere!

li.label: Snake tail
li.description: I want my legsssss back!

li.label: Scales
li.description: I wish I didn't ssssshed sssso much...

li.label: Scales
li.description: Built-in armor isss alwayssss handy...

li.label: Scales
li.description: They're coarse and rough and irritating and they're EVERYWHERE!!!

li.label: Snake...hands?
li.description: I ssssuppossse at leassssst I keep my handssss...

li.label: Snake...hands?
li.description: Armored handssss, no more paper cutsssss...

li.label: Snake...hands?
li.description: Thank whatever god there isss. I sssstill have handssss.

li.label: Snake eyes
li.description: At least I can sssstill ssssee properly.

li.label: Snake eyes
li.description: The eyesssss of a cunning tricksssssster...

li.label: Snake eyes
li.description: These eyesss look cold and unnatural...

li.label: Cold blooded
li.description: I just can't ever get myself warm enough.

li.label: Cold blooded
li.description: Nothing feels quite like sunning myself on a warm rock.

li.label: Cold blooded
li.description: I'm freaking c-c-c-cold all the time now!

li.label: Cougar face
li.description: It's hard to talk without purring.

li.label: Cougar face
li.description: Rrowwl!

li.label: Cougar face
li.description: No! I don't want to purr!

li.label: Cougar ear
li.description: Ouch, these things can hear everything.

li.label: Cougar ear
li.description: I can hear everything!

li.label: Cougar ear
li.description: I feel like an anime character...

li.label: Cougar tail
li.description: This thing is getting in the way a bit.

li.label: Cougar tail
li.description: Wow, I have a tail! Awesome!

li.label: Cougar tail
li.description: This thing keeps getting in my way! Get it off me!

li.label: Cow face
li.description: It's hard to talk right with this giant muzzle in the way.

li.label: Cow face
li.description: Hehe...Moooooooooo...

li.label: Cow face
li.description: I look and sound like a dumb animal!

li.label: Cow face
li.description: MOOOoooooo...MOOOoooooo...

li.label: Cow ears
li.description: They're soft, but they are rather large...

li.label: Cow ears
li.description: These are a great looooook on me!

li.label: Cow ears
li.description: Not my ears! I dooooon't want to be a coooow!

li.label: Cow tail
li.description: Stop. Twitching!

li.label: Cow tail
li.description: The hole in the pants is worth it for this.

li.label: Cow tail
li.description: It's terribly uncomfortable, and I can't sit in a chair!

li.label: Horns
li.description: Well, I guess I'm done wearing hats...

li.label: Horns
li.description: You mess with the bull, you get the horns!

li.label: Horns
li.description: Maybe I can file them down...would they grow back?

li.label: ...udder?!
li.description: I regret everything, I don't like this at all.

li.label: ...udder?!
li.description: Oh, uhm. This is a strange turn of events, I have to think about this for a bit...

li.label: ...udder?!
li.description: OH GOD NO.

li.label: ...udder?!
li.description: I mean, it's kind of cool. I feel like a real cow now!

li.label: Deer face
li.description: Look at my nose, it's just so...animal.

li.label: Deer face
li.description: Berries are soooo good.

li.label: Deer face
li.description: I could really use some buckshot right now.

li.label: Deer ears
li.description: Any noise causes them to flick up...

li.label: Deer ears
li.description: I can hear predators so easily now...uh, I mean, raiders!

li.label: Deer ears
li.description: Guns really hurt my ears...

li.label: Short tail
li.description: It'd be nice if it didn't flick up whenever people scare me...

li.label: Short tail
li.description: Flick, flick, flick, flick...oh, sorry!

li.label: Short tail
li.description: At least I can hide it.

li.label: Antlers
li.description: They would be fine if they weren't constantly getting stuck in door frames.

li.label: Antlers
li.description: This is awesome! I feel like I could just ram into things and destroy them!

li.label: Antlers
li.description: This is ridiculous! How am I supposed to even get on shirts now?

li.label: Antlers
li.description: Closer to the forest, and closer to my dream.

li.label: Camel face
li.description: This thing is only good for chewing grass.

li.label: Camel face
li.description: That bush is looking *really* delicious...

li.label: Camel face
li.description: I want to eat a bush right now...this is horrible!

li.label: Trunk
li.description: What the...a trunk?

li.label: Trunk
li.description: I gotta give this a toot.

li.label: Trunk
li.description: My nose...it's horrible!

li.label: Huge ears
li.description: These things are always flopping around and getting in the way...

li.label: Huge ears
li.description: I can hear everything for miles!

li.label: Huge ears
li.description: Could it get any more obvious that I'm a mutated freak?

li.label: Elephant tail
li.description: This tail is pretty useless.

li.label: Elephant tail
li.description: Well, a tail's a tail!

li.label: Elephant tail
li.description: It's just...hanging there...

li.label: Thick hide
li.description: My skin feels like hard leather, it's a little uncomfortable.

li.label: Thick hide
li.description: Nobody will be able to hurt me like this! Except emotionally...

li.label: Thick hide
li.description: Eww, it's so dense and wrinkled, like a giant callous...

li.label: Huge legs
li.description: I feel like I have trees for legs.

li.label: Huge legs
li.description: Try to push me over now!

li.label: Huge legs
li.description: Now I have to wear XXL pants!

li.label: Huge feet
li.description: These things are the size of a dinner plate.

li.label: Huge feet
li.description: Stomp, stomp, stomp! This is fun!

li.label: Huge feet
li.description: What am I gonna do with my shoes?

li.label: Elk ears
li.description: At least they keep the flies off themselves.

li.label: Elk ears
li.description: I can hear so well now!

li.label: Elk ears
li.description: These things are so twitchy, get them off me!

li.label: Elk tail
li.description: Is this stubby little thing...a tail?

li.label: Elk tail
li.description: It's so small and fluffy!

li.label: Elk tail
li.description: At least I can hide it.

li.label: Beak
li.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!

li.label: Beak
li.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.

li.label: Beak
li.description: My face! This is awf-scraw!

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: What the, where are my ears?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: ...does this make my butt look big?

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: I look like a damn bird, why?!

li.label: Fox ears
li.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.

li.label: Fox ears
li.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!

li.label: Fox ears
li.description: ...if there's one awful mutation I'm OK with...

li.label: Fox eyes
li.description: I look reasonably exotic with these...

li.label: Fox eyes
li.description: I can see in the dark, and they look so cool!

li.label: Fox eyes
li.description: I look creepy with these...

li.label: Fox face
li.description: I just licked my nose...eww.

li.label: Fox face
li.description: Oh, so that's how foxes make all those cool noises! Yip!

li.label: Fox face
li.description: My face is ruined, and I can't even talk right!

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!

li.label: Fox face
li.description: I just licked my nose...eww.

li.label: Fox face
li.description: Oh, so that's how foxes make all those cool noises! Yip!

li.label: Fox face
li.description: My face is ruined, and I can't even talk right!

li.label: Fox ears
li.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.

li.label: Fox ears
li.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!

li.label: Fox ears
li.description: ...if there's one awful mutation I'm OK with...

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!

li.label: Tiny fox face
li.description: I have a sudden compulsion to begin screaming for no reason.

li.label: Tiny fox face
li.description: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!

li.label: Tiny fox face
li.description: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!

li.label: Huge fox ears
li.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.

li.label: Huge fox ears
li.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!

li.label: Huge fox ears
li.description: These ears are too damn big!

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!

li.label: Fluffy tail
li.description: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!

li.label: Gazelle face
li.description: It's long, but it's got an interesting marking at least...

li.label: Gazelle face
li.description: So cool! Give me that grass!

li.label: Gazelle face
li.description: I'm a dirty grass eater...

li.label: Gazelle ears
li.description: Why do they have to have interesting markings? I'm so going to get shot by a raider.

li.label: Gazelle ears
li.description: Cooler! I can hear everything! Even the grass growing!

li.label: Gazelle ears
li.description: I'm going to get skinned for these...

li.label: Little tail
li.description: It's fine, I guess, and easy enough to hide.

li.label: Little tail
li.description: Cuter and cuter!

li.label: Little tail
li.description: Why do even need this tail...

li.label: Long face
li.description: Why?

li.label: Long face
li.description: So a horse walks into a bar...

li.label: Long face
li.description: I feel like the setup of a terrible joke!

li.label: Horse ear
li.description: They keep flicking around when I don't want them to.

li.label: Horse ear
li.description: I feel so majestic!

li.label: Horse ear
li.description: But I don't even like horses! I don't want their ears!

li.label: Horse tail
li.description: It's just a bundle of useless hair...

li.label: Horse tail
li.description: It's not terribly useful, but boy is it aesthetic!

li.label: Horse tail
li.description: Yeah, this is getting a trim.

li.label: Springy legs
li.description: If I hear one more 'spring in my step' joke...

li.label: Springy legs
li.description: I guess these things ARE lucky!

li.label: Springy legs
li.description: This is wrong. My feet are wrong, they're covered in fur...this is WRONG!

li.label: Husky face
li.description: My face is...actually rather cool.

li.label: Husky face
li.description: BARK BARK BARK.

li.label: Husky face
li.description: I shouldn't like it, but the husky is making me.

li.label: Pointy dog ears
li.description: They're pretty cute, I gotta say.

li.label: Pointy dog ears
li.description: They flick and point to sounds, and they're unreasonably fluffy!

li.label: Pointy dog ears
li.description: ...sigh...they're OK I suppose...

li.label: Curly fluff tail
li.description: I gotta calm down, it keeps wagging...

li.label: Curly fluff tail
li.description: I'm so excited, it's wagging so fast!

li.label: Curly fluff tail
li.description: I know I don't like it...but it's still wagging and it kind of feels OK.

li.label: Goat face
li.description: This isn't what I was planning to wake up to this morning...

li.label: Goat face
li.description: Maaah! I want to ram something!

li.label: Goat face
li.description: My face...what's wrong with my face!?

li.label: Goat ears
li.description: At least I can hear a bit better...

li.label: Goat ears
li.description: I can hear echoes so well now!

li.label: Goat ears
li.description: If anyone mentions the story about the goats and that bridge, they're a dead man!

li.label: Goat tail
li.description: What? What tail? I can't see it!

li.label: Goat tail
li.description: Fluffy and small, fun sized!

li.label: Goat tail
li.description: At least I can hide it...

li.label: Lizard face
li.description: It's so dry and rough...

li.label: Lizard face
li.description: I look like a raptor! Fear me!

li.label: Lizard face
li.description: Ew! I have to eat with this gross, scaly thing!

li.label: Spikes
li.description: These make it kind of tough to put on shirts and hats, but I'll make do.

li.label: Spikes
li.description: I think I can style these and make a new, unique look for myself!

li.label: Spikes
li.description: These damn things get caught in everything, and it hurts!

li.label: Lizard tail
li.description: This thing gets stuck in doors often, but at least it helps with my balance a bit.

li.label: Lizard tail
li.description: I can use this to whip people like a real iguana! Maybe it will help me swim too...

li.label: Lizard tail
li.description: Do lizard tails regrow if I were to get this thing removed?

li.label: Scaly hand
li.description: I would like them more if the claws wouldn't get stuck on things...

li.label: Scaly hand
li.description: These claws feel like they can just tear through everything!

li.label: Scaly hand
li.description: My fingers look so long and weird! These claws are going to have to be filed down...

li.label: Scaly foot
li.description: They're way too long.

li.label: Scaly foot
li.description: Just look at these powerful looking feet! Scaly and strong!

li.label: Scaly foot
li.description: Ew, ew, ew! Nope, these are going to have to come off.

li.label: Dog face
li.description: I just need to pant all the time...

li.label: Dog face
li.description: Look at my happy smile!

li.label: Dog face
li.description: I can't be sad with this smile...

li.label: Dog ears
li.description: They flop around all the time, it's distracting.

li.label: Dog ears
li.description: I can hear better, and they're floppy and cute!

li.label: Dog ears
li.description: I want my own ears back, give them BARK!

li.label: Dog tail
li.description: Now everyone knows what I'm thinking!

li.label: Dog tail
li.description: Awwww, it's so cute on me!

li.label: Dog tail
li.description: Why do I have to ruin all my pants for a tail that won't stop wagging?

li.label: Cat face
li.description: It's hard to talk without purring.

li.label: Cat face
li.description: Mrrow!

li.label: Cat face
li.description: No! I don't want to purr!

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad. In fact, they're kinda cool.

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: I look so cute with these ears!

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: What's with the fur on top of these things?

li.label: Bobcat tail
li.description: There's not much to say. It's a short tail.

li.label: Bobcat tail
li.description: I wish it was longer...but hey, a tail's a tail!

li.label: Bobcat tail
li.description: It's so short and stubby...at least I can kind of hide it.

li.label: Sloth face
li.description: Sooooo...slooooow...can barely speak...

li.label: Sloth face
li.description: Eating trees sure is fun!

li.label: Sloth face
li.description: I can...EAT TREES?

li.label: Fluff tuft
li.description: This tail is too heavy. Or is it just that I'm slower now?

li.label: Fluff tuft
li.description: I can't complain about a massive, fluffy tail!

li.label: Fluff tuft
li.description: God, this thing drags dirt everywhere...

li.label: Giant hairy arms
li.description: My arm is so burly and slow to move...

li.label: Giant hairy arms
li.description: I'll need a bigger bed, but this heavy feeling is great!

li.label: Giant hairy arms
li.description: GROSS! I want my normal, non-disgusting arms back!

li.label: Giant claws
li.description: I don't think I'll get used to these huge claws any time soon.

li.label: Giant claws
li.description: Don't get on my bad side...sometime tomorrow.

li.label: Giant claws
li.description: How am I meant to wipe?!

li.label: Giant hairy legs
li.description: Ugh, I barely want to move these legs...

li.label: Giant hairy legs
li.description: Wow, this is a lot of weight to carry around, but I think it's worth it.

li.label: Giant hairy legs
li.description: What has my life come to? I hate this!

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: These sloth feet don't really want me to move at a quick pace...

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: Time to kick these babies up and relax all day.

li.label: Giant feet
li.description: What about my SHOES?!

li.label: Thick wool
li.description: I feel like I spend every waking minute shaving this stuff off...

li.label: Thick wool
li.description: It's like a giant, fluffy blanket...and it goes wherever I go!

li.label: Thick wool
li.description: This wool is thick, hot and itchy...I don't like it one bit!

li.label: Monkey face
li.description: I feel like I need to shave constantly...

li.label: Monkey face
li.description: This isn't really all that different...

li.label: Monkey face
li.description: I've taken a step *back*! This is terrible!

li.label: Monkey ears
li.description: My ears...they feel like they're larger.

li.label: Monkey ears
li.description: Bigger ears! Awesome!

li.label: Monkey ears
li.description: Why are my ears bigger, that's almost useless!

li.label: Monkey tail
li.description: Huh...I can pick things up with this tail. Neat.

li.label: Monkey tail
li.description: It's like another hand. Who needs bionics when you have this?

li.label: Monkey tail
li.description: I can feel it moving, and I really don't like the sensation of being able to control it!

li.label: Hairy hands
li.description: These kinda look like my normal hands...just more primitive.

li.label: Hairy hands
li.description: I might get good wishes out these monkey paws!

li.label: Hairy hands
li.description: My hands! They look weird and old!

li.label: Hairy feet
li.description: Why can I grab things with my feet?

li.label: Hairy feet
li.description: Even more hands!

li.label: Hairy feet
li.description: Why do my shoes feel so big, and my feet so small?

li.label: Bovine face
li.description: My face is hot and fluffy, not a good mix...

li.label: Bovine face
li.description: I'm so fluffy, and a nice shade of blue!

li.label: Bovine face
li.description: If I hear "Why so blue?" one more time, I'm going to cry.

li.label: Bovine ears
li.description: Blue floppy ears...cute!

li.label: Bovine ears
li.description: Cute!

li.label: Bovine ears
li.description: Two words. Why, Randy?

li.label: Bovine tail
li.description: Muffalo have tails? I've never seen one.

li.label: Bovine tail
li.description: It's a cute little tail.

li.label: Bovine tail
li.description: Is someone flicking me? Where is it coming from?

li.label: Beak
li.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!

li.label: Beak
li.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.

li.label: Beak
li.description: My face! This is awf-scraw!

li.label: Earholes
li.description: What the, where are my ears?

li.label: Earholes
li.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?

li.label: Earholes
li.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: ...does this make my butt look big?

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: I look like a damn bird, whyyyy?!

li.label: Panther face
li.description: It's hard to talk without purring.

li.label: Panther face
li.description: Mrrow!

li.label: Panther face
li.description: No! I don't want to purr!

li.label: Panther ears
li.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad.

li.label: Panther ears
li.description: I can hear everything!

li.label: Panther ears
li.description: I feel like an anime character...

li.label: Panther tail
li.description: Why does this thing move so much?

li.label: Panther tail
li.description: It's so smooth and sleek!

li.label: Panther tail
li.description: How am I supposed to sit down in a chair with this thing?

li.label: Raccoon mask
li.description: I feel like I should be rooting around in a trash can.

li.label: Raccoon mask
li.description: Finally, these leftovers taste good!

li.label: Raccoon mask
li.description: Why do I want to eat garbage...

li.label: Raccoon ears
li.description: They're alright, but I'd prefer to have my normal ears.

li.label: Raccoon ears
li.description: These ears are kinda cool.

li.label: Raccoon ears
li.description: They're irritating and itchy.

li.label: Ringtail
li.description: The pattern on this thing is kinda cool, I guess.

li.label: Ringtail
li.description: It's like a tube of fluffiness! Tails are great!

li.label: Ringtail
li.description: It won't come off!!

li.label: Ratty face
li.description: It's too sensitive for my liking. I'm almost overwhelmed with strong smells.

li.label: Ratty face
li.description: A lot of people say rats are gross, but I think this looks good on me!

li.label: Ratty face
li.description: I don't want to look like a squeaking PEST!

li.label: Rat ears
li.description: They're upright at least.

li.label: Rat ears
li.description: Good for hearing possible enemies!

li.label: Rat ears
li.description: I want these cut off.

li.label: Rat tail
li.description: It trails behind me uselessly...

li.label: Rat tail
li.description: I wish it was better at something...

li.label: Rat tail
li.description: I feel dirty and like a thief, like this is a punishment...

li.label: Rodent hands
li.description: These paws sure are good at picking up little things off the ground.

li.label: Rodent hands
li.description: They're so dainty and dextrous, these are better than my old hands!

li.label: Rodent hands
li.description: Ahhhhh! They're so wrinkly! Get them off me!

li.label: Rat feet
li.description: Didn't I have five toes?

li.label: Rat feet
li.description: Perfect for stealing and getting out fast!

li.label: Rat feet
li.description: I have the feet of a sewer beast!

li.label: Rhino horn
li.description: Let's hope the colony doesn't want to mount my head on a wall...

li.label: Rhino horn
li.description: Look at this majestic horn, I feel powerful!

li.label: Rhino horn
li.description: I WILL STAB SOMEBODY WITH THIS THING.

li.label: Rhino ears
li.description: Did someone stick some tubes on my ears?

li.label: Rhino ears
li.description: Perfect for healing and cooling you off a bit!

li.label: Rhino ears
li.description: I'm used to my ears, not these weird tubes...

li.label: Rhino tail
li.description: It's just a useless piece of skin hanging of me...

li.label: Rhino tail
li.description: Well...it's a tail, I guess.

li.label: Rhino tail
li.description: Why do I even have this...weird tail thing?!

li.label: Sheep face
li.description: Baaaaaaaa? I don't really want to eat grass...

li.label: Sheep face
li.description: Who needs a lawnmower when you could just do it yourself?

li.label: Sheep face
li.description: Wha-a-a-at's wrong my my fa-a-a-aace?!

li.label: Sheep face
li.description: I don't need to be able to cook when I could just eat grass!

li.label: Sheep eye
li.description: The pupils look so...animal.

li.label: Sheep eye
li.description: Nobody can sneak up on me now...!

li.label: Sheep eye
li.description: They make me look like a stupid sheep!

li.label: Sheep ear
li.description: They are really annoying sometimes, blocking my vision flopping around.

li.label: Sheep ear
li.description: Baaaa! Look at my ears!

li.label: Sheep ear
li.description: I look like I belong in a cage...

li.label: Sheep tail
li.description: Nubby...

li.label: Sheep tail
li.description: It's soooo cute!

li.label: Sheep tail
li.description: This is too weird for me, but at least I can hide it from people.

li.label: Snowy face
li.description: It's hard to talk without purring.

li.label: Snowy face
li.description: Mrrow!

li.label: Snowy face
li.description: No! I don't want to purr!

li.label: Snowy ears
li.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad. They're kinda cute, actually.

li.label: Snowy ears
li.description: I can hear everything!

li.label: Snowy ears
li.description: I feel like an anime character...

li.label: Snowy tail
li.description: Sure, it's fluffy and all, but it kind of gets in the way...

li.label: Snowy tail
li.description: So big! So fluffy! I love it!

li.label: Snowy tail
li.description: God, this thing is always getting in my way...

li.label: Spotted face
li.description: It's hard to talk without purring.

li.label: Spotted face
li.description: Mrrow!

li.label: Spotted face
li.description: No! I don't want to purr!

li.label: Leopard ears
li.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad.

li.label: Leopard ears
li.description: I can hear everything!

li.label: Leopard ears
li.description: I feel like an anime character...

li.label: Spotted tail
li.description: These spots are kinda cool.

li.label: Spotted tail
li.description: It's not as fluffy as I would have liked, but it's still cool!

li.label: Spotted tail
li.description: This thing has a mind of its own! Get it off me!

li.label: Squirrel face
li.description: What's with the teeth?

li.label: Squirrel face
li.description: I could eat nuts all day long!

li.label: Squirrel face
li.description: I HATE THESE F$&% TEETH.

li.label: Squirrel face
li.description: I could live off nuts alone...just like in the wild!

li.label: Squirrel ear
li.description: These ears are a little weird, but not too bad.

li.label: Squirrel ear
li.description: Did I just hear a bird?

li.label: Squirrel ear
li.description: I look like a rat!

li.label: Squirrel tail
li.description: Come on, does it *have* to be this big?

li.label: Squirrel tail
li.description: I just wanna use this thing as a blanket!

li.label: Squirrel tail
li.description: What's the point in having such a big tail?

li.label: Thrumbo face
li.description: A bit messy, I don't exactly like it.

li.label: Thrumbo face
li.description: I go really go for a tree right now!

li.label: Thrumbo face
li.description: Sloppy and gross, I want it off!

li.label: Thrumbo ear
li.description: They're pretty good at hearing, I'll give them that.

li.label: Thrumbo ear
li.description: Wonderful ears for a wonderful creature!

li.label: Thrumbo ear
li.description: They're stupid, and I don't want to have them...

li.label: Thrumbo tail
li.description: Having a tail is quite strange but it does feel very luxurious.

li.label: Thrumbo tail
li.description: It's so soft and velvety! Who needs a pillow when I have this?

li.label: Thrumbo tail
li.description: I don't care if some think it's majestic, I HATE it.

li.label: Razor horn
li.description: Ouch! This thing is VERY sharp.

li.label: Razor horn
li.description: It's majestic...no wait, it's me that is majestic now.

li.label: Razor horn
li.description: Maybe if I let them cut it off and sell it...maybe they could get some medicine that could undo this...please...

li.label: Tortoise face
li.description: There goes my skin routine.

li.label: Tortoise face
li.description: I look so wise and ancient!

li.label: Tortoise face
li.description: I look like I'm 300 years old! I don't want this at all!

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: What the, where are my ears?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!

li.label: Tortoise tail
li.description: It's short, stubby, and in the way.

li.label: Tortoise tail
li.description: I can wiggle it, but that's about it.

li.label: Tortoise tail
li.description: I have to cut a hole in my pants for THIS?

li.label: Half-shell
li.description: Ugh, this thing is pretty awkward. Armored, but heavy.

li.label: Half-shell
li.description: It's heavy, but a natural suit of armor, awesome!

li.label: Half-shell
li.description: So slow and...heavy...and I can't take it off!

li.label: Beak
li.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!

li.label: Beak
li.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.

li.label: Beak
li.description: My face! This is awf-gobble!

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: What the, where are my ears?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: ...does this make my butt look big?

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.

li.label: Tailfeathers
li.description: I look like a damn turkey, whyyyy?!

li.label: Warg face
li.description: These jaws are very strong...I REALLY hope I don't bite my tongue by accident.

li.label: Warg face
li.description: The bite force of these jaws is incredible! No need for cutlery any more!

li.label: Warg face
li.description: I look like a rabid beast...

li.label: Warg ears
li.description: I swear these things move as if they have a mind of their own.

li.label: Warg ears
li.description: I can hear prey from a mile away!

li.label: Warg ears
li.description: Theses ears belong on a corpse eating warg...NOT ME.

li.label: Warg tail
li.description: Damn thing keeps knocking over everything it touches!

li.label: Warg tail
li.description: This thing is unbelievably strong, I could probably beat someone in an arm wrestle with it!

li.label: Warg tail
li.description: It's bristly, stiff and has an unnatural amount of muscle in it...disgusting.

li.label: Wolf muzzle
li.description: I sound ridiculous trying to speak with this thing.

li.label: Wolf muzzle
li.description: So many scents! This is incredible!

li.label: Wolf muzzle
li.description: I'm smelling things I wish I couldn't. I want my old face back...

li.label: Yappy face
li.description: Hair keeps getting in my nose and eyes, its so itchy.

li.label: Yappy face
li.description: Cute! Admittedly not very practical, though.

li.label: Yappy face
li.description: I look like a show dog, I feel pathetic.

li.label: Yappy ears
li.description: I'm not sure how useful these stubby little ears are.

li.label: Yappy ears
li.description: They look cute, and I can hear better than before. A win-win!

li.label: Yappy ears
li.description: They look ridiculous.

li.label: Yappy tail
li.description: It serves no purpose...I'd rather not have it.

li.label: Yappy tail
li.description: I'm not sure it has much use but it is adorable.

li.label: Yappy tail
li.description: It's not a tail, it's a mutated tumor sticking out from my spine.
